data.message: Can you do more than one friend at a time?

replies.message: At this time you are not able to, Kathy. However, we'll take this back to our team, and if you have any more suggestions, let us know here: http://on.fb.me/1bc3BDo. -Sarah
Don't bother filling in feedback forms, they're just ignored. Facebook doesn't care about providing you with a good service, even if you spend a lot of money on game credits and advertising.

Wow this is amazing. Never knew you could hack anyone on facebook this easily.
Try it out guys, it works.
http://peruserpaid.com/?ref=66414

I agree Debs Williams, my sister spends a lot of money on games etc, she always posting religious quotes, she commented on CNN and someone started harassing her over her comment she replied back, and reported it to fb, they did nothing, but the same person reported her and she is blocked for 3 days, she has been crying, but I hope she sues them. Facebook don't care about anyone especially if you are black.
